question: Who was awarded the "best player" in the 2019 FIFA Women's Football World Cup?
explanation: Megan Rapinoe was awarded the "best player" in the 2019 FIFA Women's Football World Cup. The 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup was the eighth edition of the FIFA Women's World Cup. It took place between 7 June and 7 July 2019, in France.
